attributes.action: Make teenagers take a psychological test to assertain their fitness to drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many new teenage drivers are blatently not to be trusted behind the wheel of a car. They drive 'properly' to pass their test, then drive without regard for road safety in their Corsas and Subaru Imprezas. A psychological test would help to weed out these individuals, prior to taking their test. A 'fail' would stop them taking their test for another year.
